question: Which of the following empire was known as the "Abyssinia"?
explanation: The Ethiopian Empire was also known as Abyssinia. It was a monarchy that ruled states of Ethiopia and Eritrea from 1270 to 1974. It was an ancient form of Christianity based Kingdom. This Kingdom was found in the 13th century CE by the Kings of the Solomonic dynasty. The Ethiopian Empire would be one of only two African states never to be formally colonized by a European power.
